TopicTitle: Ariane 5 and other Projects under development

Articles.Content:
> 
> And when you say config, do you also can do useful node\_deffinitions? It means quite a lot of time, but that can help me really much. You can be a co-autor of the mod this way, what do you think?

 i ment to test the cfg but i could try with it(new to moding though)

> 
> Ok. Now, you are in testing team if you want, but all parts aren\'t completed (text+ model), you must wait some time.

YAY! 

(first time being a beta tester ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png))

PM me when its ready for Beta testing.

Ok, now everyone can see CoreStageFuelTank, download link:

[http://www./?mojrkybbjl8p16k](http://www./?mojrkybbjl8p16k)

It\'s not a testing release of one part! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Also, sorry, but I removed Ariane 4 from the poll. Anyway, Ariane 4 will be second, I promised that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy to hear that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Exactly, I promised that to you, and i like Ariane 4 too.

I am interested in the Ariane 7, that sounds interesting.Hope that one gets a few more votes, and the tank works great, still seems to have a bit too much fuel, I managed to get in orbit with it, and still had a lot of fuel left.

what about ariane 6?

ps the core tank is great!

beta test :

[glow=green,2,300]pass[/glow]
I hope the Ariane 6 plans will be released soon, therefore I wrote Ariane 7.

> ![97025023.png](http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/9929/97025023.png)

I worked hard on the textures and now I can say cca 80% of textures are complete!

Also, I saw more images of Hermes, old and new and anyway, it looks quite horrible.

But what about smoething like this? :

[http://hqworld.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=22523&sessionid=40e595e557aa4779442573b36635b4ac](http://hqworld.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=22523&sessionid=40e595e557aa4779442573b36635b4ac)

> 
> [http://hqworld.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=22523&sessionid=40e595e557aa4779442573b36635b4ac](http://hqworld.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=22523&sessionid=40e595e557aa4779442573b36635b4ac)

That actually looks good, and with the planes we have now, it would be interesting to launch it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I wouldn\'t waste time on spaceplanes until the flight physics work properly. At the moment, it\'s a bit of a waste of time.

Ok, any progress info...

Today, I can say I\'m done with launching rocket Ariane 5 (model+textures), not with payloads etc., but I think It would be great with working RCS/ASS systems on the top of SRB\'s.
can you send me it for alpha/beta testing?

> 
> Ok, any progress info...
> 
> Today, I can say I\'m done with launching rocket Ariane 5 (model+textures), not with payloads etc., but I think It would be great with working RCS/ASS systems on the top of SRB\'s.

No, I\'m done with textures and models, not configs and exporting files.
> ![ariane5finalmodelrender.png](http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/7826/ariane5finalmodelrender.png)

> 
> 
> > 
> > ![ariane5finalmodelrender.png](http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/7826/ariane5finalmodelrender.png)

That looks like its almost one, when you finish work on configs, could you make it an early beta release, or late alpha?
While it\'s a very neat picture (Great job tadeass) no one wants to see it twice on the same page, If you have to quote the post above yours at least put the pictures in spoiler tags comando222.

Are they separate parts? Or are they just one big part?

I could give a shot at configs.
Sorry, just forgot to put it in spoiler.Won\'t happen again.

> 
> Are they separate parts? Or are they just one big part?
> 
> I could give a shot at configs.

And can you do node\_definitions? I have testers for the other things.

Hi,

I have one 'offer' to everyone who want to help with making this project.

Because I\'m done with textures and in the moment, I only need to make complete configs. It\'s not so difficult work, but it spends some time. Is anyone interested in making configs and complete part folders for the project? If you want to do it, you will be a co-author of mod.

Maybe now you don\'t understand why I need special-people for this thing. It\'s just because the time what I must spend with making configs and part folders I can spend with making the models and textures of the winner of the poll, and Ariane 4.

So, I\'m waiting for you! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hi,
>
